list.title: #BuildforCOVID19 Global Online Hackathon
list.description: The COVID-19 Global Hackathon is an opportunity for developers to build software solutions that drive social impact, with the aim of tackling some of the challenges related to the current coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.

list.title: codevscovid19
list.description: Create solutions to address COVID19 Challenges.

list.title: #WirvsVirus: hacking to fight the crisis
list.description: The Federal Government's 'Hackathon' has yielded lots of suggestions for solving problems to do with the Corona crisis. This was Germany's biggest digital competition of ideas to date.

list.title: Official COVID-19 hackathon in Sweden
list.description: Official COVID-19 hackathon in Sweden. An initiative by The Swedish Government.

list.title: StudentsAgainstCorona
list.description: A Facebook group for students want to help about Coronavirus.

list.title: IBM call for code - COVID-19
list.description: With the unprecedented effect of COVID-19, unite to help communities across the globe deal with the impact of the greatest crisis of modern times.
